title: Time and Work
excerpt: Full-time dev life in Freiburg is cool, but "adulting" chores after work can really drain your battery. I've found that just doing the annoying stuff right away is the only way to actually clear my head and enjoy my freedom.

title: What is this blog about?
excerpt: I just finished my master's and felt that "what now" itch. So, I learned to deploy a site and found the Digital Garden concept. This is my messy corner of the internet for dumping ideas and creating just because I can.
